layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x98
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x98
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x82
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 784x82 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 782x80
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 782x76
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 388x76 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 384x72
                text run at (2,2) width 212: "This cell text should be justified "
                text run at (213,2) width 173: "which means that the right"
                text run at (2,20) width 247: "and left margins should line up, no "
                text run at (248,20) width 138: "matter how long the"
                text run at (2,38) width 293: "content becomes (except the last line which "
                text run at (295,38) width 91: "should be left"
                text run at (2,56) width 53: "aligned)"
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (392,29) size 388x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 231x18
                text run at (2,2) width 231: "This cell text should be left justified"
